name: Bullet Cheese
description:
This was made for the 8h leap year game jam, made on feb 29th 2020. The theme for the jam was bulletproof. So you play as a bulletproof cheese (why not) that must avoid cheese greats, slicers and forks, but make sure to catch the bullets. Oh, and you can slow down time.

Controls

Move with WASD and slow down time with Shift or Space.

Credits

Code: IsacDee and Max
Art: Wowbagger
